content_fields.desc: **Required.** The encryption algorithm the key in this event is to be used with. Must be 'm.megolm.v1.aes-sha2'.
content_fields.title: enum

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The room where the key is used.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The ID of the session that the key is for.
content_fields.title: string

desc:
This event type is used to exchange keys for end-to-end encryption. Typically
it is encrypted as an ``m.room.encrypted`` event, then sent as a `to-device`_ event.
